abstract: A recent (and surprisingly early) winter storm knocked out power for hundreds of thousands. Next time, you may want to consider this backup system.
snippet: A recent (and surprisingly early) winter storm knocked out power for hundreds of thousands. Next time, you may want to consider this backup system.
lead_paragraph: The recent shock of a pre-Halloween winter storm has left many people without power. Next time, those in the dark may want to check out a new product called Mr. Beams.

headline.main: Lights Out! Uh-Huh! Flash! Flash! Flash!
